FluentMail |Build Status| |PyPI|
--------------------------------

Python SMTP client and Email for Humansâ„¢

Simple
------

FluentMail tries to keep it simple as possible.

Install
-------

``pip install fluentmail``

Compatibility
-------------

Works with Python 2.6+, Python 3.3+, PyPy and PyPy 3.

Documentation
-------------

You can find some info on the project wiki.

Features
--------

-  SMTP
-  Mailgun
-  Plain or HTML body
-  Alternative body
-  Attachments

Future work
-----------

-  More test coverage
-  Dummy backend
-  FileBased backend
-  MemoryBased backend
-  Support template engines (Django, Jinja)
-  Support custom message headers
-  Set default backend
-  Thread-safety
-  Inline attachment
-  What more?
